MetaProbeset Class Reference

Very basic class to store the meta probesets (groups of probesets) that a user specifies for analysis. More...

Detailed Description

Very basic class to store the meta probesets (groups of probesets) that a user specifies for analysis.

Definition at line 33 of file MetaProbeset.h.

Member Function Documentation

void MetaProbeset::readMetaProbesetList ( affx::TsvFile &  tsv,
std::vector< MetaProbeset * > &  metaSets 
) [static]

Read in a grouping file for probesets which merges probesets into larger probesets called "meta" probesets.

Requires at least two columns of data, a probeset_id for the newly created probeset and a probeset_list which contains a space separated list of probesets to merge.

Parameters:
tsv - File to read meta probesets from.
metaSets - Meta probesets to fill in from file.
